level.heading: USE OF TITLE OR ABBREVIATIONS (ยง 17-5812)

level.text: Only persons certified, as certified nurse-midwives by the Board shall be designated as such and have the right to use the title “Certified Nurse-Midwife” (CNM) and the title or abbreviations designated by the Board or an approved national certifying body.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 36 DCR 3497, 3504 (May 12, 1989); as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 49 DCR 11751 (December 27, 2002).
